headline: Philadelphia attorney talks about his U.S. Senate campaign
author: Karen Shuey
sentences: That includes his victory last fall in preventing the city from removing a statue of Christopher Columbus in a dispute that highlighted tensions over views of exploration, Italian American history and colonialism.
The prominent Philadelphia attorney said he has built his career on high-profile cases that challenge progressive movements and promote conservative values.
Now, Bochetto is taking on a new challe ...
George Bochetto is not afraid of a fight.
